My dear Melissa was surprised at my being out so late, and said, ‘If you had come earlier you might at least have helped us; a wolf got into the house and worried all our sheep, and let their blood like a butcher. But when Ι reached home, my soldier was lying in bed like an ox, with a doctor looking after his neck. Other people may think what they like about this3 but may all your guardian angels punish me if 1 am lying.”
